ComicInfo.Summary: This is what I think about every time I come back to the crowd with comics under my arm to share and explore! After the success of the 1st issue of FWACATA, it was a hard road to get issue 2 out. It's SO hard that, indeed, I'm getting issue 3 almost done! (more on that later). I moved across the country, started a new career, and am finally back at the drawing table making comics! Issue 2 is ready for print, with issue 3 hot on its heels. This issue features new characters, story arcs, and more FWACATA than ever! FEATURING: “PACHANGA” Part 1 A new VIGIL multi-part story starts here in issue 2! Meathook prowls the streets of Miami, making sure the streets are safe, but now he has to deal with drugs hitting the streets laced with Gamma Radiation! You thought fentanyl was bad; wait till you meet COKEHED! “OFFICE UNICORN” by Juan Navarro & Kenny Calderon Office jobs are boring; we all know that. But some people enjoy that and love the dismal routine. NOT UNICORNS. Welcome to the first day of the OFICCE UNICORN; we hope you survive the experience! A series of comic strips done in collaboration with Kenny Calderon (WILD INX) over the year. Here is a collected version of the strips we've done so far! “THE RIGHT VIEW” Part 2 In issue 1, we follow a disgraced ex-cop named Jonathan “REZ” Reznick. A corrupt homicide detective, he stumbles upon a murder cult and, after an Occult ritual goes awry, is “occupied” by his past lives. He uses this ability now to save his soul and bring good to the world, but he wants ice cream right now. But slowly, his old life as a scumbag is coming back to haunt him. Plus, a one-shot comic strip and other extras!
